conbody.p: To rename a report, you can use one of the following two methods listed below.
conbody.note: Keep in mind that either method does not perform a Save As of the report, but actually renames the same report.

ol.li:
Rename the report from the report listing:
Go to the Analyzer dashboard, select Data Design from the dropdown list, click Reports.
The Manage Report screen with the current listing of reports is displayed.
Double-click a report and edit its name in place as shown in Figure 4-46.
Figure 4-46: Renaming a Report - NEED NEW SCREENSHOT

Rename the report from the report listing:
Go to the Analyzer dashboard, select Data Design from the dropdown list, click Reports.
The Manage Report screen with the current listing of reports is displayed.
Scroll or use filters to find the report you want to rename. For details on finding reports, see Chapter 2: Viewing Reports.
Check the report that you want to rename and click the Edit button. d On the reportâ€™s screen, retype the name in the Report Title box.
Click Save and Close.
The report is now displayed with its new name in the Manage Reports screen.
